comments: Dr. Wendler is a great teacher. He is extremely encouraging, and I learned so many useful teaching methods from him.

I don\'t know WHAT that other person is talking about. Dr. Wendler is amazing! He is incredibly intelligent and has a lot of teaching experience to bring to the table. I know myself and the others in my classes learned A LOT about how to teach reading from him.

This professor was very strict and terrible to learn from. His learning environment was very uncharacteristic to any other Professor at MLC. Try not to take his class, he seems nice outside of class but in class he is TERRIBLE!
